title: Your weekend stars
text:
See what the weekend stars have in store for you.

WEEKEND OCTOBER 26-27, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

Business and financial matters are favoured this weekend. As long as you focus on the figures and don’t take shortcuts. Intense research and investigation now will pay off handsomely further down the track.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

Communication is highlighted this weekend. But make sure you really concentrate on what people are saying. If you assume things without listening closely, then you could put your foot firmly in your mouth!

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

This weekend, make sure you show others what you are really capable of. If you want things to change at work, then it’s up to you to think faster and smarter. And take the time to listen to others.

CANCER June 22-July 23 **

You’re channelling energy into a challenging assignment or professional project. But is a friend or loved one feeling neglected? With the Moon in Libra, strive to get the work/life balance right.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Family matters and local community issues are highlighted. But don’t spoil the opportunity to make a difference by speaking out of turn. If you rush your responses, that’s when problem will occur.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

The Moon’s in Libra so a diplomatic demeanour will help smooth over any problems that crop up this weekend. When it comes to social media, make sure you check twice before you post!

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

With serious Saturn highlighting your home zone, your domestic life is up and down at the moment. A family member may need your help this weekend, so find the time to give your assistance gladly.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

A relationship with a relative or neighbour may feel as if it’s going backwards. Tap into your Scorpio intuition to figure out where they are coming from. Then you’ll know what to do next.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 **

It’s a time to incorporate a spiritual discipline - like yoga or meditation – into your daily routine. Otherwise your work load and stress levels could impact on your health and general well-being.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

It’s a good time to approach group projects with extra energy and commitment, as the planets shine a spotlight on your true passions. But don’t assume that others know what you are thinking.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

The way you communicate with work colleagues, customers or clients is vital at the moment. If you take the time to think things through carefully, then there’s less chance of mistakes happening.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

The Moon and Mars are in Libra, which encourages cooperation, compromise and companionship. It’s also the perfect time to escape on a weekend getaway with family and/or friends.

SATURDAY

YOUR DAY

The buzz words today are consultation and cooperation.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are a fabulous organiser, especially when it comes to finances. The next 12 months is the time to argue less plus relax and listen a lot more.

SUNDAY

YOUR DAY

It will be a stop-start kind of day so pace yourself.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Born on the zodiac’s Day of Impulse, you are an energetic and powerful person. 2020 is the year to encourage loved ones to follow their dreams.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the weekend stars have in store for you.
